entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@MarshaBlackburn @realDonaldTrump In his Thursday-evening White House coronavirus press briefing, President Donald Trump mused that bringing "light" inside the body or even injecting people's lungs with disinfectants should be investigated as coronavirus treatments.
